quote_first: He looked around the carriage he was sitting in. It was full of night people, waiters, nurses, party returners, drunks—even a traffic warden. The train eventually pulled into his station at
title: A Matter of Honor

quote_last: that Mrs. O’Keefe had died very shortly after her return home.

quote_last: ?” exclaimed Helen. “My mother will certainly think we’re lost. But I hate to go. It is magnificent, even if it is terrible.”
